989.name: AA 307P
989.Applications: Welding stainless steel to low alloyed steels (dissimilar welds), buffer layers before hard facing,  rails crossings, armour plate, austenitic manganese steels and other difficult to weld steels.
989.Suitable_For: Dissimilar welding between steel and stainless steel, armor plate, exhaust systems (type 409, 304), high Manganese austenitic steel, difficult to weld steels such as: 42CrMo4, C45, 42MnV7, tool steels etc.
